;===============================================================
;== TRIGGER DATA STARTS HERE ==
;===============================================================

;------------------------------------------
Trigger V0010_Standard_Battle_Attacker_Crushing_Victory_VnV_Trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and BattleOdds < 1.2
          and not Toggled gradual trait loss

    Affects GoodAttacker  2  Chance  90 
    Affects GoodCommander  1  Chance  100 
    Affects InspiringSpeaker  1  Chance  6 
    Affects GoodCommander  1  Chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger REMASTERED_V0010_Standard_Battle_Attacker_Crushing_Victory_VnV_Trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and BattleOdds < 1.2
          and Toggled gradual trait loss
          and Trait BadAttacker = 0

    Affects GoodAttacker  2  Chance  90 
    Affects GoodCommander  1  Chance  100 
    Affects InspiringSpeaker  1  Chance  6 
    Affects GoodCommander  1  Chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger REMASTERED_CrushingAttackerVictory_lower_bad_attacker
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and BattleOdds < 1.2
          and Toggled gradual trait loss
          and Trait BadAttacker > 0

    Affects BadAttacker  Lose  2  Chance  90

;------------------------------------------
Trigger V0020_Standard_Battle_Attacker_Crushing_Loss_VnV_Trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 0.7
          and not Toggled gradual trait loss

    Affects BadAttacker  2  Chance  95 
    Affects BadCommander  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger REMASTERED_V0020_Standard_Battle_Attacker_Crushing_Loss_VnV_Trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 0.7
          and Toggled gradual trait loss
          and Trait GoodAttacker = 0

    Affects BadAttacker  2  Chance  95 
    Affects BadCommander  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger REMASTERED_CrushingLoss_LowerGoodAttacker
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 0.7
          and Toggled gradual trait loss
          and Trait GoodAttacker > 0

    Affects GoodAttacker  Lose  2  Chance  95 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger V0030_Standard_Battle_Defender_Crushing_Victory_VnV_Trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition not WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and BattleOdds < 1.2
          and not Toggled gradual trait loss

    Affects GoodDefender  2  Chance  95 
    Affects GoodCommander  1  Chance  100 
    Affects InspiringSpeaker  1  Chance  6 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger REMASTERED_V0030_Standard_Battle_Defender_Crushing_Victory_VnV_Trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition not WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and BattleOdds < 1.2
          and Toggled gradual trait loss
          and Trait BadDefender = 0

    Affects GoodDefender  2  Chance  95 
    Affects GoodCommander  1  Chance  100 
    Affects InspiringSpeaker  1  Chance  6 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition not WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and BattleOdds < 1.2
          and Toggled gradual trait loss
          and Trait BadDefender > 0

    Affects BadDefender  Lose  2  Chance  95

Trigger crushing_victory_for_sub4_general_4BIpatch
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and BattleOdds >= 1.2
          and BattleOdds < 2.1
          and GeneralNumKillsInBattle > 2
          and Attribute Command < 4

    Affects GoodCommander  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger clear_victory_for_sub4_general_4BIpatch
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = clear
          and BattleOdds >= 1.2
          and BattleOdds < 1.9
          and Attribute Command < 4
          and GeneralNumKillsInBattle > 2

    Affects GoodCommander  1  Chance  33 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest PostBattle

          and IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds < 0.5
          and BattleOdds > 0.16
          and not Toggled gradual trait loss

    Affects GoodCommander  1  Chance  100 
    Affects InspiringSpeaker  1  Chance  15 
    Affects GoodCommander  1  Chance  33

          and Trait BadRiskyAttacker = 0

Trigger V0190_Withdraw_Before_Battle_Even_Odds_VnV_Trigger
    WhenToTest PreBattleWithdrawal

    Condition IsGeneral
          and I_WithdrawsBeforeBattle
          and BattleOdds > 0.7
          and BattleOdds < 2.1

    Affects IndecisiveAttacker  3  Chance  100 
    Affects Coward  1  Chance  15 
    Affects BadCommander  1  Chance  3 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest PreBattleWithdrawal

    Condition IsGeneral
          and I_WithdrawsBeforeBattle
          and BattleOdds > 2.1

    Affects IndecisiveAttacker  8  Chance  100 
    Affects Coward  1  Chance  50 
    Affects BadCommander  1  Chance  10 

;------------------------------------------

          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and PercentageUnitCategory infantry > 90
          and BattleOdds < 1.6
          and not Toggled gradual trait loss

          and Trait BadInfantryGeneral = 0

          and not WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and PercentageUnitCategory infantry > 85
          and BattleOdds > 0.7
          and not Toggled gradual trait loss

    Affects BadInfantryGeneral  1  Chance  100 
    Affects BadCommander  1  Chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger REMASTERED_V0220_Standard_Battle_Crushing_Defeat_Infantry_Commander_VnV_Trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and PercentageUnitCategory infantry > 85
          and BattleOdds > 0.7
          and Toggled gradual trait loss
          and Trait GoodInfantryGeneral = 0

    Affects BadInfantryGeneral  1  Chance  100 
    Affects BadCommander  1  Chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger REMASTERED_CrushingInfantryDefeat_lose_good_infantry
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and PercentageUnitCategory infantry > 85
          and BattleOdds > 0.7
          and Toggled gradual trait loss
          and Trait GoodInfantryGeneral > 0

    Affects GoodInfantryGeneral  Lose  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger V0230_Standard_Battle_Crushing_Victory_Cavalry_Commander_VnV_Trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and PercentageUnitCategory cavalry > 55
          and BattleOdds < 1.2
          and not Toggled gradual trait loss

    Affects GoodCavalryGeneral  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger REMASTERED_V0230_Standard_Battle_Crushing_Victory_Cavalry_Commander_VnV_Trigger

          and PercentageUnitCategory cavalry > 55
          and BattleOdds < 1.2
          and Toggled gradual trait loss
          and Trait BadCavalryGeneral = 0

    Affects GoodCavalryGeneral  1  Chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Stone_wall_siege_attack_success
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and I_ConflictType Siege
          and BattleOdds < 2
          and I_BattleSettlementFortificationLevel >= 2
          and not Toggled gradual trait loss

    Affects GoodSiegeAttacker  1  Chance  90 
    Affects GoodAttacker  1  Chance  15 
    Affects GoodEngineer  1  Chance  15 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger REMASTERED_Stone_wall_siege_attack_success
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and I_ConflictType Siege
          and BattleOdds < 2
          and I_BattleSettlementFortificationLevel >= 2
          and Toggled gradual trait loss
          and Trait BadAttacker = 0

    Affects GoodSiegeAttacker  1  Chance  90 
    Affects GoodAttacker  1  Chance  15 
    Affects GoodEngineer  1  Chance  15 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and I_ConflictType Siege
          and BattleOdds < 2
          and I_BattleSettlementFortificationLevel >= 2
          and Toggled gradual trait loss
          and Trait BadAttacker > 0

    Affects BadAttacker  Lose  1  Chance  15 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and I_ConflictType Siege
          and BattleOdds >= 1.2
          and I_BattleSettlementFortificationLevel >= 2
          and not Toggled gradual trait loss

    Affects BadSiegeAttacker  1  Chance  99 
    Affects BadAttacker  1  Chance  20

          and IsGeneral

          and not Toggled gradual trait loss

Trigger worthy_of_adoption_1
    WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption


    Affects GoodCommander  1  Chance  50 
    Affects GoodAttacker  1  Chance  18 
    Affects GoodDefender  1  Chance  18 
    Affects GoodSiegeAttacker  1  Chance  8 
    Affects Brave  1  Chance  4 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption


    Affects Handsome  1  Chance  4 
    Affects Sobriety  1  Chance  12 
    Affects Disciplinarian  1  Chance  5 
    Affects GoodAdministrator  1  Chance  14 
    Affects Austere  1  Chance  1 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption


    Affects BattleScarred  1  Chance  3 
    Affects GoodAmbusher  1  Chance  12 
    Affects Intelligent  1  Chance  7 
    Affects NaturalMilitarySkill  1  Chance  5

    WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption

    Affects Superstitious  1  Chance  5 
    Affects GoodCommander  2  Chance  8 
    Affects Aesthetic  1  Chance  3

Trigger drink2_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= tavern

    Affects Drink  1  Chance  4 
    Affects Gambling  1  Chance  2 
    Affects Girls  1  Chance  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger sitting_around_town
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and RandomPercent > 90

    Affects Drink  1  Chance  1 
    Affects Gambling  1  Chance  1 
    Affects Girls  1  Chance  2 
    Affects Joker  1  Chance  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger sitting_around_camp
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition not EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and RandomPercent > 40

    Affects Feck  1  Chance  1 
    Affects HaleAndHearty  1  Chance  1 
    Affects Scout  1  Chance  2 
    Affects Joker  1  Chance  1 
    Affects Joker  1  Chance  1

          and Trait Idealist = 0
          and Trait Guardian = 0
          and Trait Artisan = 0

    Affects Rational  1  Chance  10

Trigger dads_a_bit_drunk_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait Drink >= 1
          and FatherTrait Drink <= 2

    Affects Sobriety  3  Chance  50 
    Affects PhlegmHumour  1  Chance  10 
    Affects Drink  1  Chance  30 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait Drink >= 3
          and FatherTrait Drink <= 4

    Affects Sobriety  9  Chance  75 
    Affects BlackBileHumour  1  Chance  20 
    Affects Drink  1  Chance  30 

;------------------------------------------

          and FatherTrait Drink <= 6

;------------------------------------------
Trigger dads_StrategicSkill
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait StrategicSkill >= 1

    Affects StrategicSkill  1  Chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger dads_Superstitious
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait Superstitious >= 1

    Affects Superstitious  1  Chance  20 
    Affects Insane  1  Chance  2 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger dads_TacticalSkill
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait TacticalSkill >= 1

    Affects TacticalSkill  1  Chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger dads_Pragmatic
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait Pragmatic >= 1

    Affects Pragmatic  1  Chance  20 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger dads_Xenophilia
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait Xenophilia >= 1

    Affects Xenophilia  2  Chance  15 
    Affects Intelligent  1  Chance  6 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger dads_Xenophobia
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait Xenophobia >= 1

    Affects Xenophobia  2  Chance  15 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger dads_NaturalMilitaryTalent
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait NaturalMilitarySkill >= 1

    Affects NaturalMilitarySkill  1  Chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger dads_authoritarian
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait Authoritarian >= 1

    Affects NonAuthoritarian  3  Chance  15 
    Affects KindRuler  1  Chance  20 
    Affects Generous  1  Chance  7 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger dads_romanauthoritarian
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait AuthoritarianRomanVirtue >= 1

    Affects NonAuthoritarian  3  Chance  15 
    Affects KindRuler  1  Chance  20 
    Affects Xenophilia  2  Chance  2 
    Affects Loyal  2  Chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger dads_kindruler
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FatherTrait KindRuler >= 1

    Affects KindRuler  1  Chance  50 
    Affects HarshRuler  2  Chance  4 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge


    Affects Aesthetic  1  Chance  2 
    Affects Coward  2  Chance  2 
    Affects GoodSiegeAttacker  1  Chance  1 
    Affects Generous  2  Chance  2

;------------------------------------------
Trigger random_birth_nomad_1
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition CultureType nomad

    Affects HatesRoman  1  Chance  4 
    Affects HaleAndHearty  1  Chance  2 
    Affects FearsHun  1  Chance  5 
    Affects HatesHun  1  Chance  5 
    Affects GoodCavalryGeneral  2  Chance  3 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger random_birth_hun_1
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition CultureType hun

    Affects HunnicFearsomeness  1  Chance  16 
    Affects HatesRoman  1  Chance  4 
    Affects HaleAndHearty  1  Chance  2 
    Affects NaturalMilitarySkill  1  Chance  2 
    Affects Ignorance  1  Chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger random_birth_hun_2
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition CultureType hun

    Affects GoodCavalryGeneral  2  Chance  4 
    Affects HatesNomad  1  Chance  3 
    Affects HunnicFearsomeness  1  Chance  15 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger luxurious_lifestyle3
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= city_plumbing
          and Treasury > 5000

    Affects Aesthetic  1  Chance  2 
    Affects Epicurean  1  Chance  3 
    Affects ExpensiveTastes  1  Chance  2 
    Affects Gambling  1  Chance  2 
    Affects Generous  1  Chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger luxurious_lifestyle5
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= silk_rd
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= governors_palace
          and Treasury > 8000

    Affects Aesthetic  1  Chance  3 
    Affects Epicurean  1  Chance  2 
    Affects ExpensiveTastes  1  Chance  2 
    Affects Gambling  1  Chance  1 
    Affects Girls  1  Chance  3 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger luxurious_lifestyle6
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and CultureType roman
          and Treasury > 1000
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= city_plumbing
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= curia

    Affects Loyal  1  Chance  1 
    Affects Epicurean  1  Chance  1 
    Affects ApicianRomanVice  1  Chance  2 
    Affects Gambling  1  Chance  1 
    Affects Girls  1  Chance  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger harsh_lifestyle1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists = governors_house
          and RandomPercent > 50

    Affects Austere  1  Chance  1 
    Affects Ignorance  1  Chance  5 
    Affects Pragmatic  1  Chance  5 
    Affects Stoic  1  Chance  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger harsh_lifestyle2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition not EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and InUncivilisedLands
          and RandomPercent > 90

    Affects Austere  1  Chance  5 
    Affects Ignorance  1  Chance  8 
    Affects Pragmatic  1  Chance  8 
    Affects Stoic  1  Chance  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger harsh_lifestyle3
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition not EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 0
          and Attribute Management >= 3

    Affects LogisticalSkill  1  Chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger goveror_not_building
    WhenToTest SettlementTurnEnd

    Condition GovernorInResidence
          and BuildingQueueIdleDespiteCash

    Affects BadBuilder  1  Chance  3 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger governor_building
    WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted

    Condition GovernorInResidence

    Affects GoodBuilder  1  Chance  20 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger hate_n_fear1
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 0.4
          and BattleOdds < 1.3
          and GeneralFoughtCulture roman
          and not CultureType roman

    Affects HatesRoman  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger hate_n_fear2
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 0.4
          and BattleOdds < 1.3
          and GeneralFoughtCulture nomad
          and not CultureType nomad

    Affects HatesNomad  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger hate_n_fear3
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 0.4
          and BattleOdds < 1.3
          and GeneralFoughtCulture hun
          and not CultureType hun

    Affects HatesHun  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger hate_n_fear4
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 0.4
          and BattleOdds < 1.3
          and GeneralFoughtCulture eastern
          and not CultureType eastern

    Affects HatesEastern  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger hate_n_fear5
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 0.4
          and BattleOdds < 1.3
          and GeneralFoughtCulture carthaginian
          and not CultureType carthaginian

    Affects HatesCarthaginian  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger hate_n_fear6
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 0.4
          and BattleOdds < 1.3
          and GeneralFoughtCulture barbarian
          and not CultureType barbarian

    Affects HatesBarbarian  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 0.9
          and GeneralFoughtCulture roman
          and not CultureType roman

    Affects FearsRoman  1  Chance  100

    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 0.9
          and GeneralFoughtCulture nomad
          and not CultureType nomad

    Affects FearsNomad  1  Chance  100

    Condition IsGeneral

          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 0.9
          and GeneralFoughtCulture hun
          and not CultureType hun

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 0.9
          and GeneralFoughtCulture eastern
          and not CultureType eastern

    Affects HatesZoroastrian  1  Chance  10 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 0.9
          and GeneralFoughtCulture carthaginian
          and not CultureType carthaginian

    Affects FearsCarthaginian  1  Chance  100

Trigger hate_n_fear12
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and I_ConflictType Normal
          and BattleOdds >= 0.9
          and GeneralFoughtCulture barbarian
          and not CultureType barbarian

    Affects FearsBarbarian  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger failed_to_attack
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInEnemyZOC

    Affects IndecisiveAttacker  1  Chance  50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle1
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition GeneralHPLostRatioinBattle > 0.6
          and not CultureType roman

    Affects BattleScarred  1  Chance  10 
    Affects Brave  1  Chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle1b
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition GeneralHPLostRatioinBattle > 0.6
          and Trait Berserker >= 1

    Affects Berserker  1  Chance  30 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle1R
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition GeneralHPLostRatioinBattle > 0.6
          and CultureType roman
          and Attribute Command > 1

    Affects BattleScarred  1  Chance  10 
    Affects RomanHero  1  Chance  10 
    Affects Disloyal  1  Chance  33 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle2
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition GeneralNumKillsInBattle > 6
          and IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and not CultureType roman
          and Attribute Command < 3
          and BattleOdds <= 1.5

    Affects Brave  1  Chance  10 
    Affects VictorOthersVirtue  1  Chance  70 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle2R
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition GeneralNumKillsInBattle > 6
          and IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and CultureType roman
          and Attribute Command < 3
          and BattleOdds <= 1.4

    Affects RomanHero  1  Chance  10 
    Affects Disloyal  1  Chance  33 
    Affects VictorRomanVirtue  1  Chance  50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle3
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition GeneralNumKillsInBattle > 10
          and not CultureType roman

    Affects Bloodthirsty  1  Chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle3R
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition GeneralNumKillsInBattle > 10
          and CultureType roman
          and Attribute Command > 1

    Affects Disloyal  1  Chance  15 
    Affects Bloodthirsty  1  Chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle4
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition not GeneralFoughtInCombat
          and PercentageEnemyKilled = 0
          and BattleOdds <= 1.2

    Affects Coward  1  Chance  66 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle5
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and CultureType roman
          and Attribute Command >= 3
          and BattleOdds <= 1.4

    Affects VictorRomanVirtue  1  Chance  100 
    Affects InspiringSpeaker  1  Chance  6 
    Affects Disloyal  1  Chance  66 
    Affects RomanHero  1  Chance  20 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle6
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and not CultureType roman
          and Attribute Command >= 3
          and BattleOdds <= 1.4

    Affects VictorOthersVirtue  1  Chance  100 
    Affects InspiringSpeaker  1  Chance  4 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger battle7
    WhenToTest BattleGeneralRouted


    Affects Coward  1  Chance  66 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger warlord1
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and not CultureType roman
          and not CultureType eastern
          and Trait GoodCommander >= 2
          and BattleOdds <= 2
          and GeneralHPLostRatioinBattle > 0.3
          and GeneralNumKillsInBattle > 2
          and Trait VictorOthersVirtue >= 1

    Affects Warlord  1  Chance  100 
    Affects Brave  1  Chance  10 
    Affects VictorOthersVirtue  1  Chance  30 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger withdraws
    WhenToTest PreBattleWithdrawal

    Condition WasAttacker

    Affects IndecisiveAttacker  2  Chance  95 
    Affects BadCommander  1  Chance  3 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger undersiege
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsUnderSiege

    Affects Austere  1  Chance  4 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger triumphs1
    WhenToTest GeneralCaptureSettlement

    Condition not CultureType roman

    Affects VictorOthersVirtue  1  Chance  100 
    Affects HunnicFearsomeness  1  Chance  15 
    Affects VictorOthersVirtue  1  Chance  30 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger triumphs2
    WhenToTest GeneralCaptureSettlement

    Condition CultureType roman
          and Attribute Command > 1

    Affects VictorRomanVirtue  1  Chance  100

Trigger selfperpetuating48
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Trait Corrupt >= 1

    Affects Corrupt  1  Chance  3 
    Affects Perverted  1  Chance  2 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger spyinit1
    WhenToTest AgentCreated

    Condition AgentType = spy

    Affects NaturalSpySkill  1  Chance  100 
    Affects GoodConspirator  1  Chance  20 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger spyinit2
    WhenToTest AgentCreated

    Condition AgentType = spy
          and Trait NaturalSpySkill = 1

    Affects NaturalSpySkill  1  Chance  25 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger spyinit2_byzantine
    WhenToTest AgentCreated

    Condition FactionType empire_east
          and AgentType = spy
          and Trait NaturalSpySkill >= 1

    Affects NaturalSpySkill  1  Chance  30 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger spyinit3
    WhenToTest AgentCreated

    Condition AgentType = spy
          and Trait NaturalSpySkill >= 2

    Affects NaturalSpySkill  1  Chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger diplomatinit1
    WhenToTest AgentCreated

    Condition AgentType = diplomat

    Affects NaturalDiplomatSkill  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger diplomatinit2
    WhenToTest AgentCreated

    Condition AgentType = diplomat
          and Trait NaturalDiplomatSkill = 1

    Affects NaturalDiplomatSkill  1  Chance  30 
    Affects NaturalDiplomatSkill  1  Chance  15 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger diplomatinit3
    WhenToTest AgentCreated

    Condition AgentType = diplomat
          and Trait NaturalDiplomatSkill >= 2
          and CultureType roman

    Affects NaturalDiplomatSkill  1  Chance  25 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger assassininit1
    WhenToTest AgentCreated

    Condition AgentType = assassin

    Affects NaturalAssassinSkill  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger assassininit2
    WhenToTest AgentCreated

    Condition AgentType = assassin
          and Trait NaturalAssassinSkill = 1

    Affects NaturalAssassinSkill  1  Chance  9 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger assassininit2_byzantine
    WhenToTest AgentCreated

    Condition FactionType empire_east
          and AgentType = assassin
          and Trait NaturalAssassinSkill >= 1

    Affects NaturalAssassinSkill  1  Chance  33 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger assassininit3
    WhenToTest AgentCreated

    Condition AgentType = assassin
          and Trait NaturalAssassinSkill >= 2

    Affects NaturalAssassinSkill  1  Chance  33 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger assassininit4
    WhenToTest AgentCreated

    Condition AgentType = assassin
          and SettlementBuildingExists = great_forum

    Affects NaturalAssassinSkill  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger assassininit5
    WhenToTest AgentCreated

    Condition AgentType = assassin
          and SettlementBuildingExists = curia

    Affects NaturalAssassinSkill  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger devastation
    WhenToTest GeneralDevastatesTile


    Affects Despoiler  1  Chance  20 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger LesserGeneralOfferedForAdoption
    WhenToTest LesserGeneralOfferedForAdoption


    Affects GoodCommander  1  Chance  90 
    Affects GoodCommander  2  Chance  10 
    Affects NaturalMilitarySkill  1  Chance  10 
    Affects GoodSiegeAttacker  1  Chance  12 
    Affects StrategicSkill  1  Chance  6 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger LesserGeneralOfferedForAdoption2
    WhenToTest LesserGeneralOfferedForAdoption


    Affects Brave  1  Chance  8 
    Affects Sobriety  1  Chance  16 
    Affects Disciplinarian  1  Chance  6 
    Affects Austere  1  Chance  5 
    Affects Intelligent  1  Chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger LesserGeneralOfferedForAdoption3
    WhenToTest LesserGeneralOfferedForAdoption


    Affects Generous  1  Chance  8 
    Affects LoyaltyStarter  1  Chance  100 
    Affects BattleScarred  1  Chance  8 
    Affects InspiringSpeaker  1  Chance  9 
    Affects Pragmatic  1  Chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger LesserGeneralOfferedForAdoption4
    WhenToTest LesserGeneralOfferedForAdoption

    Condition FactionLeaderTrait Christian >= 1
          and Trait Pagan = 0
          and Trait Christian = 0
          and Trait Zoroastrian = 0

    Affects Christian  1  Chance  100 
    Affects ChristianProselytism  1  Chance  2 
    Affects ChristianPoverty  1  Chance  2 
    Affects HatesPagan  1  Chance  1 
    Affects GoodSiegeDefender  1  Chance  20 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger LesserGeneralOfferedForAdoption5
    WhenToTest LesserGeneralOfferedForAdoption

    Condition FactionLeaderTrait Pagan >= 1
          and Trait Pagan = 0
          and Trait Christian = 0
          and Trait Zoroastrian = 0

    Affects Pagan  1  Chance  100 
    Affects HatesChristianity  1  Chance  2 
    Affects PaganDisillusion  1  Chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger LesserGeneralOfferedForAdoption6
    WhenToTest LesserGeneralOfferedForAdoption

    Condition FactionLeaderTrait Zoroastrian >= 1
          and Trait Pagan = 0
          and Trait Christian = 0
          and Trait Zoroastrian = 0

    Affects Zoroastrian  1  Chance  100 
    Affects ZoroastrianDisillusion  1  Chance  1 
    Affects HatesPagan  1  Chance  1 
    Affects GoodSiegeDefender  1  Chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger admiral1
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition AgentType = admiral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleOdds < 1.8

    Affects Sailor  1  Chance  70 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger admiral2
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition AgentType = admiral
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleOdds  > 1.8

    Affects Landlubber  1  Chance  70 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger corruption1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= proconsuls_palace
          and Treasury > 13000

    Affects Corrupt  1  Chance  1 
    Affects Aesthetic  1  Chance  1 
    Affects ExpensiveTastes  1  Chance  1 
    Affects Epicurean  1  Chance  1 
    Affects Embezzler  1  Chance  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger corruption2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= proconsuls_palace
          and Treasury > 18000

    Affects Corrupt  1  Chance  2 
    Affects Aesthetic  1  Chance  2 
    Affects ExpensiveTastes  1  Chance  3 
    Affects Epicurean  1  Chance  3 
    Affects Embezzler  1  Chance  2 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger corruption4
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= proconsuls_palace
          and Treasury > 24000

    Affects Corrupt  1  Chance  4 
    Affects Aesthetic  1  Chance  4 
    Affects ExpensiveTastes  1  Chance  3 
    Affects Epicurean  1  Chance  3 
    Affects Embezzler  1  Chance  4 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger corruption3
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= proconsuls_palace
          and Treasury > 24000
          and CultureType roman

    Affects ApicianRomanVice  1  Chance  5 
    Affects Loyal  1  Chance  3 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger corruption4_western_empire
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= proconsuls_palace
          and Treasury > 13000
          and Treasury <= 24000
          and CultureType roman
          and FactionType empire_west

    Affects ApicianRomanVice  1  Chance  4 
    Affects Corrupt  1  Chance  2 
    Affects Embezzler  1  Chance  2 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger factionleader
    WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

    Condition not CultureType roman

    Affects Factionleader  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger reinherited
    WhenToTest BecomesFactionHeir

    Condition Trait Exheir = 1
          and not CultureType roman

    Affects Factionheir  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger inherited
    WhenToTest CeasedFactionHeir

    Condition IsFactionLeader
          and not CultureType roman

    Affects Exheir  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger becomesheir
    WhenToTest BecomesFactionHeir

    Condition not CultureType roman

    Affects Factionheir  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger demoted
    WhenToTest BecomesFactionHeir

    Condition IsFactionLeader
            and not CultureType roman

    Affects Factionheir  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger disinherited_non_romans
    WhenToTest CeasedFactionHeir

    Condition not Trait Exheir = 1
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and not CultureType roman

    Affects Exheir  2  Chance  100 
    Affects BlackBileHumour  1  Chance  8 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger diet_of_carrots_1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition Trait NightBattleCapable = 0
          and IsGeneral
          and Attribute Command >= 4

    Affects NightBattleCapable  6  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger diet_of_carrots_2
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and Attribute Command >= 1
          and IsNightBattle
          and Trait NightBattleCapable = 0
          and WonBattle

    Affects NightBattleCapable  6  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger birthbaseloyaltysetup
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge


    Affects LoyaltyStarter  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger factionleader_roman
    WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

    Condition CultureType roman
          and not FactionType romano_british
          and not FactionType slave

    Affects RomanFactionleader  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger reinherited_roman
    WhenToTest BecomesFactionHeir

    Condition Trait Exheir = 1
          and CultureType roman
          and not FactionType romano_british
          and not FactionType slave

    Affects RomanFactionheir  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger disinherited_roman
    WhenToTest CeasedFactionHeir

    Condition not Trait Exheir = 1
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and CultureType roman
          and not FactionType romano_british
          and not FactionType slave

    Affects Exheir  2  Chance  100 
    Affects BlackBileHumour  1  Chance  10 
    Affects Disloyal  2  Chance  100 
    Affects Disloyal  2  Chance  50 
    Affects Disloyal  1  Chance  33 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger inherited_roman
    WhenToTest CeasedFactionHeir

    Condition IsFactionLeader
          and CultureType roman
          and not FactionType romano_british
          and not FactionType slave

    Affects Exheir  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger becomesheir_roman
    WhenToTest BecomesFactionHeir

    Condition CultureType roman
          and not FactionType romano_british
          and not FactionType slave

    Affects RomanFactionheir  1  Chance  100 
    Affects Loyal  1  Chance  100 
    Affects Loyal  1  Chance  33 
    Affects Loyal  1  Chance  25 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger demoted_roman
    WhenToTest BecomesFactionHeir
    
    Condition IsFactionLeader
          and CultureType roman
          and not FactionType romano_british
          and not FactionType slave

    Affects RomanFactionheir  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger factionleader_romano_british_or_slave
    WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader

    Condition not FactionType empire_east
          and not FactionType empire_east_rebels
          and not FactionType empire_west
          and not FactionType empire_west_rebels
          and CultureType roman

    Affects Factionleader  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger reinherited_romano_british_or_slave
    WhenToTest BecomesFactionHeir

    Condition Trait Exheir = 1
          and not FactionType empire_east
          and not FactionType empire_east_rebels
          and not FactionType empire_west
          and not FactionType empire_west_rebels
          and CultureType roman

    Affects Factionheir  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger disinherited_romano_british_or_slave
    WhenToTest CeasedFactionHeir

    Condition not Trait Exheir = 1
          and not IsFactionLeader
          and not FactionType empire_east
          and not FactionType empire_east_rebels
          and not FactionType empire_west
          and not FactionType empire_west_rebels
          and CultureType roman

    Affects Exheir  2  Chance  100 
    Affects BlackBileHumour  1  Chance  10 
    Affects Disloyal  2  Chance  100 
    Affects Disloyal  2  Chance  50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger inherited_romano_british_or_slave
    WhenToTest CeasedFactionHeir

    Condition IsFactionLeader
          and not FactionType empire_east
          and not FactionType empire_east_rebels
          and not FactionType empire_west
          and not FactionType empire_west_rebels
          and CultureType roman

    Affects Exheir  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger becomesheir_romano_british_or_slave
    WhenToTest BecomesFactionHeir

    Condition not FactionType empire_east
          and not FactionType empire_east_rebels
          and not FactionType empire_west
          and not FactionType empire_west_rebels
          and CultureType roman

    Affects Factionheir  1  Chance  100 
    Affects Loyal  1  Chance  100 
    Affects Loyal  1  Chance  33 
    Affects Loyal  1  Chance  25 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger demoted_romano_british_or_slave
    WhenToTest BecomesFactionHeir
    
    Condition IsFactionLeader
          and not FactionType empire_east
          and not FactionType empire_east_rebels
          and not FactionType empire_west
          and not FactionType empire_west_rebels
          and CultureType roman

    Affects Factionheir  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger ambusher_victory
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and I_ConflictType SuccessfulAmbush
          and WasAttacker
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and not Toggled gradual trait loss

    Affects GoodAmbusher  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger REMASTERED_ambusher_victory
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and I_ConflictType SuccessfulAmbush
          and WasAttacker
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and Toggled gradual trait loss
          and Trait BadAmbusher = 0

    Affects GoodAmbusher  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger REMASTERED_ambusher_victory_LowerBadAmbusher
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and I_ConflictType SuccessfulAmbush
          and WasAttacker
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and Toggled gradual trait loss
          and Trait BadAmbusher > 0

    Affects BadAmbusher  Lose  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger ambusher_defeat_failed_ambush
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and I_ConflictType FailedAmbush
          and WasAttacker
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleOdds >= 1.2
          and not Toggled gradual trait loss

    Affects BadAmbusher  1  Chance  75 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger REMASTERED_ambusher_defeat_failed_ambush
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and I_ConflictType FailedAmbush
          and WasAttacker
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleOdds >= 1.2
          and Toggled gradual trait loss
          and Trait GoodAmbusher = 0

    Affects BadAmbusher  1  Chance  75 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger REMASTERED_ambusher_defeat_failed_ambush_LowerGoodAmbusher
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and I_ConflictType FailedAmbush
          and WasAttacker
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleOdds >= 1.2
          and Toggled gradual trait loss
          and Trait GoodAmbusher > 0

    Affects GoodAmbusher  Lose  1  Chance  75 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger ambushed_victory
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and I_ConflictType SuccessfulAmbush
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and BattleOdds <= 1.1
          and not Toggled gradual trait loss

    Affects GoodAmbusher  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger REMASTERED_ambushed_victory
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and I_ConflictType SuccessfulAmbush
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and BattleOdds <= 1.1
          and Toggled gradual trait loss
          and Trait BadAmbusher = 0

    Affects GoodAmbusher  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger REMASTERED_ambushed_victory_LowerBadAmbusher
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and I_ConflictType SuccessfulAmbush
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and BattleOdds <= 1.1
          and Toggled gradual trait loss
          and Trait BadAmbusher > 0

    Affects BadAmbusher  Lose  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger ambushed_defeat
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and I_ConflictType SuccessfulAmbush
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleOdds >= 0.8
          and not Toggled gradual trait loss

    Affects BadAmbusher  1  Chance  33 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger REMASTERED_ambushed_defeat
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and I_ConflictType SuccessfulAmbush
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleOdds >= 0.8
          and Toggled gradual trait loss
          and Trait GoodAmbusher = 0

    Affects BadAmbusher  1  Chance  33 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger REMASTERED_ambushed_defeat_LowerGoodAmbusher
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition IsGeneral
          and I_ConflictType SuccessfulAmbush
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleOdds >= 0.8
          and Toggled gradual trait loss
          and Trait GoodAmbusher > 0

    Affects GoodAmbusher  Lose  1  Chance  33 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger birth_religion_follow_my_leader_1
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FactionLeaderTrait Christian >= 1

    Affects Christian  1  Chance  75 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger birth_religion_follow_my_leader_2
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FactionLeaderTrait Pagan >= 1

    Affects Pagan  1  Chance  75 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger birth_religion_follow_my_leader_3
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FactionLeaderTrait Zoroastrian >= 1

    Affects Zoroastrian  1  Chance  75 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger birth_religion_nomad_goth_1
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FactionType goths
          and Trait Pagan = 0
          and Trait Christian = 0
          and Trait Zoroastrian = 0

    Affects Christian  1  Chance  50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger birth_religion_nomad_goth_2
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FactionType goths
          and Trait Christian = 0
          and Trait Zoroastrian = 0
          and Trait Pagan = 0

    Affects Pagan  1  Chance  100 
    Affects PaganDisillusion  1  Chance  7 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger birth_religion_nomad_1
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition CultureType nomad
          and Trait Christian = 0
          and Trait Zoroastrian = 0
          and Trait Pagan = 0

    Affects Christian  1  Chance  15 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger birth_religion_nomad_2
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition CultureType nomad
          and Trait Christian = 0
          and Trait Zoroastrian = 0
          and Trait Pagan = 0

    Affects Pagan  1  Chance  100 
    Affects PaganDisillusion  1  Chance  7 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger birth_religion_barbarian_saxons_1
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FactionType saxons
          and Trait Christian = 0
          and Trait Zoroastrian = 0
          and Trait Pagan = 0

    Affects Pagan  1  Chance  100 
    Affects PaganDisillusion  1  Chance  7 
    Affects PaganConversion  1  Chance  4 
    Affects PaganConversion  1  Chance  3 
    Affects PaganConversion  1  Chance  2 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger birth_religion_barbarian_except_saxons_1
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition CultureType barbarian
          and not FactionType saxons
          and Trait Pagan = 0
          and Trait Christian = 0
          and Trait Zoroastrian = 0

    Affects Christian  1  Chance  30 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger birth_religion_barbarian_except_saxons_2
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition CultureType barbarian
          and not FactionType saxons
          and Trait Christian = 0
          and Trait Zoroastrian = 0
          and Trait Pagan = 0

    Affects Pagan  1  Chance  100 
    Affects PaganDisillusion  1  Chance  7 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger birth_religion_romano_british
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition FactionType romano_british
          and I_TurnNumber > 70
          and Trait Pagan = 0
          and Trait Christian = 0
          and Trait Zoroastrian = 0

    Affects Christian  1  Chance  100 
    Affects ChristianPelagianHeresy  1  Chance  29 
    Affects ChristianPoverty  1  Chance  5 
    Affects ChristianDisillusion  1  Chance  15 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger birth_religion_roman_1
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition CultureType roman
          and Trait Pagan = 0
          and Trait Christian = 0
          and Trait Zoroastrian = 0

    Affects Pagan  1  Chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger birth_religion_roman_2
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition CultureType roman
          and Trait Pagan = 0
          and Trait Christian = 0
          and Trait Zoroastrian = 0

    Affects Christian  1  Chance  100 
    Affects ChristianProselytism  1  Chance  3 
    Affects ChristianPoverty  1  Chance  5 
    Affects HatesPagan  1  Chance  1 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition CultureType carthaginian
          and Trait Christian = 0
          and Trait Zoroastrian = 0
          and Trait Pagan = 0

    Affects Christian  1  Chance  100 
    Affects ChristianDisillusion  1  Chance  15 
    Affects ChristianPoverty  1  Chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger birth_religion_eastern_1
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition CultureType eastern
          and Trait Christian = 0
          and Trait Zoroastrian = 0
          and Trait Pagan = 0

    Affects Zoroastrian  1  Chance  100 
    Affects ZoroastrianDisillusion  1  Chance  1 
    Affects HatesChristianity  1  Chance  3 
    Affects HatesPagan  1  Chance  1 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge

    Condition CultureType hun
          and Trait Pagan = 0
          and Trait Christian = 0
          and Trait Zoroastrian = 0

    Affects Pagan  1  Chance  100 
    Affects PaganDisillusion  1  Chance  7

    WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption

    Condition FactionLeaderTrait Christian >= 1

    Affects Christian  1  Chance  79

    Affects ChristianPelagianHeresy  1  Chance  33 
    Affects ChristianPoverty  1  Chance  5 
    Affects ReligiousMania  1  Chance  13 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger adoption_religion_roman_1
    WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption

    Condition CultureType roman
          and Trait Pagan = 0
          and Trait Christian = 0
          and Trait Zoroastrian = 0

    Affects Pagan  1  Chance  10 
    Affects PlainRomanVirtue  1  Chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger adoption_religion_roman_2
    WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption

    Condition CultureType roman
          and Trait Pagan = 0
          and Trait Christian = 0
          and Trait Zoroastrian = 0

    Affects Christian  1  Chance  100 
    Affects ChristianProselytism  1  Chance  3 
    Affects ChristianPoverty  1  Chance  5 
    Affects HatesPagan  1  Chance  1 

;------------------------------------------

          and Trait Pagan = 0

          and Trait Christian = 0
          and Trait Zoroastrian = 0
          and Trait Pagan = 0

    WhenToTest AgentCreated

    Condition FactionLeaderTrait Christian >= 1

    Affects Christian  1  Chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger agent_religion_pagan_faction_leader
    WhenToTest AgentCreated

    Condition FactionLeaderTrait Pagan >= 1

    Affects Pagan  1  Chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger agent_religion_zoroastrian_faction_leader
    WhenToTest AgentCreated

    Condition FactionLeaderTrait Zoroastrian >= 1

    Affects Zoroastrian  1  Chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger agent_religion_christian_roman
    WhenToTest AgentCreated

    Condition not AgentType = assassin
          and CultureType roman
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= church_christianity_shrine
          and Trait Pagan = 0
          and Trait Christian = 0
          and Trait Zoroastrian = 0

    Affects Christian  1  Chance  10 

;------------------------------------------

          and Trait Christian = 0
          and Trait Zoroastrian = 0

    Affects Pagan  1  Chance  10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger christians_battle_temple
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Trait Christian >= 1
          and EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_battle_temple

    Affects HatesPagan  1  Chance  1 
    Affects ChristianConversion  1  Chance  1 
    Affects ChristianProselytism  1  Chance  2 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Trait Christian >= 1
          and EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= temple_of_battleforge_temple

    Affects ChristianConversion  1  Chance  1 
    Affects ChristianProselytism  1  Chance  2

;------------------------------------------
Trigger christians_acadamies
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Trait Christian >= 1
          and EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= hermitage

    Affects ChristianPiety  1  Chance  1 
    Affects ChristianDonatistHeresy  1  Chance  3 
    Affects ChristianArianHeresy  1  Chance  3 
    Affects ChristianNestorianHeresy  1  Chance  3 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger christians_acadamies_after_pelagius
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Trait Christian >= 1
          and EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= hermitage
          and I_TurnNumber > 70

    Affects ChristianPelagianHeresy  1  Chance  2 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger christians_hermitage_plus_big_trade
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition Trait Christian >= 1
          and EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= hermitage
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= great_forum

    Affects ChristianPoverty  1  Chance  6 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger christian_governor_constructs_big_markets
    WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted

    Condition Trait Christian >= 1
          and Trait ChristianPiety >= 1
          and EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= hermitage
          and SettlementBuildingFinished >= forum

    Affects ChristianPoverty  1  Chance  15 
    Affects Sobriety  1  Chance  12 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger christian_governor_constructs_christian_academies
    WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted

    Condition Trait Christian >= 1
          and EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingFinished >= hermitage

    Affects ChristianDonatistHeresy  1  Chance  10 
    Affects ChristianArianHeresy  1  Chance  10 
    Affects ChristianNestorianHeresy  1  Chance  10 
    Affects ChristianPiety  1  Chance  10 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted

    Condition I_TurnNumber > 70
          and Trait Christian >= 1
          and EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingFinished >= hermitage

    Affects ChristianPelagianHeresy  1  Chance  8 
    Affects ChristianPiety  1  Chance  10

Trigger zoroastrian_governor_constructs_temple_of_hunting_lots
    WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted

    Condition Trait Zoroastrian >= 1
          and Trait ZoroastrianPiety >= 1
          and EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingFinished >= temple_of_hunting_lots_shrine

    Affects HatesPagan  1  Chance  2 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted

    Condition Trait Zoroastrian >= 1
          and Trait ZoroastrianPiety >= 1
          and EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingFinished >= temple_of_law_shrine

    Affects HatesPagan  1  Chance  2 
    Affects Sobriety  1  Chance  15

          and Trait ZoroastrianPiety >= 1

;------------------------------------------
Trigger night_battle_crushing_victory_attacker
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and BattleOdds < 2
          and IsNightBattle

    Affects Noctophilia  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger night_battle_crushing_victory_defender
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition not WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and BattleOdds < 2
          and IsNightBattle

    Affects Noctophilia  1  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger night_battle_crushing_loss_attacker
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and IsNightBattle

    Affects Noctophobia  1  Chance  66 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger night_battle_crushing_loss_defender
    WhenToTest PostBattle

    Condition not WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and not WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess >= clear
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and IsNightBattle

    Affects Noctophobia  1  Chance  66 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger spying_target
    WhenToTest ExecutesASpyOnAMission


    Affects CounterSpy  1  Chance  50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger assassination_target
    WhenToTest ExecutesAnAssassinOnAMission


    Affects AssassinCatcher  1  Chance  95 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger races
    WhenToTest GovernorThrowRaces


    Affects RacesFanRomanVice  1  Chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger races_2a
    WhenToTest GovernorThrowRaces

    Condition Trait RacesFanRomanVice >= 1
          and Trait RaceFanBlue = 0
          and Trait RaceFanGreen = 0
          and Trait RaceFanRed = 0
          and Trait RaceFanWhite = 0

    Affects RaceFanBlue  1  Chance  8 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest GovernorThrowRaces

    Condition Trait RacesFanRomanVice >= 1
          and Trait RaceFanBlue = 0
          and Trait RaceFanGreen = 0
          and Trait RaceFanRed = 0
          and Trait RaceFanWhite = 0

    Affects RaceFanGreen  1  Chance  8

    Condition Trait RacesFanRomanVice >= 1
          and Trait RaceFanBlue = 0
          and Trait RaceFanGreen = 0
          and Trait RaceFanRed = 0
          and Trait RaceFanWhite = 0

          and Trait RaceFanBlue = 0
          and Trait RaceFanGreen = 0
          and Trait RaceFanRed = 0
          and Trait RaceFanWhite = 0

;------------------------------------------
Trigger education
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= academy
          and not CultureType hun
          and Trait Ignorance < 1
          and Trait Insane <= 1
          and RandomPercent > 50
          and not RemasteredEducation

    Affects PhilosophySkill  1  Chance  2 
    Affects NaturalPhilosophySkill  1  Chance  2 
    Affects RhetoricSkill  1  Chance  2 
    Affects GoodEngineer  1  Chance  1 
    Affects PoliticsSkill  1  Chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger education_remastered
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= academy
          and not CultureType hun
          and Trait Ignorance < 1
          and Trait Insane <= 1
          and RandomPercent > 50
          and RemasteredEducation

    Affects PhilosophySkill  1  Chance  2 
    Affects NaturalPhilosophySkill  1  Chance  2 
    Affects RhetoricSkill  1  Chance  2 
    Affects GoodEngineer  1  Chance  2 
    Affects PoliticsSkill  1  Chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger education_education
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= scriptorium
          and not CultureType hun
          and Trait Ignorance < 1
          and Trait Insane <= 1
          and not RemasteredEducation

    Affects PoeticSkill  1  Chance  2 
    Affects TacticalSkill  1  Chance  1 
    Affects ArchitectSkill  1  Chance  1 
    Affects Stoic  1  Chance  1 
    Affects LogisticalSkill  1  Chance  1 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger education_education_remastered
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= scriptorium
          and not CultureType hun
          and Trait Ignorance < 1
          and Trait Insane <= 1
          and RemasteredEducation

    Affects PoeticSkill  1  Chance  2 
    Affects TacticalSkill  1  Chance  2 
    Affects ArchitectSkill  1  Chance  2 
    Affects Stoic  1  Chance  1 
    Affects LogisticalSkill  1  Chance  2 
    Affects PhilosophySkill  1  Chance  2
    Affects NaturalPhilosophySkill  1  Chance  2 
    Affects RhetoricSkill  1  Chance  2

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and Trait Ignorance < 1
          and Trait Insane <= 1
          and SettlementBuildingExists = ludus_magnus
          and CultureType roman
          and not RemasteredEducation

    Affects BoringSpeaker  1  Chance  2 
    Affects MathematicsSkill  1  Chance  2 
    Affects StrategicSkill  1  Chance  1 
    Affects PhilosophySkill  1  Chance  2 
    Affects PoliticsSkill  1  Chance  10

    Condition not CultureType roman
          and not CultureType eastern
          and SettlementBuildingFinished >= governors_palace
          and EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100

    Affects GoodAdministrator  1  Chance  50 
    Affects GoodBuilder  1  Chance  15

          and not CultureType eastern
          and SettlementBuildingFinished >= stone_wall
          and EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100

    Affects GoodBuilder  1  Chance  15

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition AgentType = merchant
    and Trait SpiritualMilieuHorse = 1
    and RegionTradingResource wild_animals

    Affects SpiritualMilieuHorse  2  Chance  100 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

    Condition AgentType = merchant
    and Trait SpiritualMilieuHorse = 1
    and RegionTradingResource timber

    Affects SpiritualMilieuHorse  3  Chance  100
